mapper.select: SELECT T.TAG_NUM "tagNum", UI.ADDRZONECODE "address", UI.BIRTH_YEAR "birthYear", SUM(CASE WHEN CO.COURSE_ORDER = 1 THEN CO.PLACE_ID END) "place1", SUM(CASE WHEN CO.COURSE_ORDER = 2 THEN CO.PLACE_ID END) "place2", SUM(CASE WHEN CO.COURSE_ORDER = 3 THEN CO.PLACE_ID END) "place3" FROM COURSE_ORDER CO JOIN COURSE C ON(CO.COURSE_ID = C.COURSE_ID) JOIN USER_INFO UI ON(C.USER_ID = UI.USER_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_TAGS UT ON(UT.USER_ID = UI.USER_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN TAGS T ON(UT.TAG_ID = T.TAG_ID) GROUP BY T.TAG_NUM, UI.ADDRZONECODE, UI.BIRTH_YEAR, C.USER_ID, C.COURSE_ID
